department.en: MSc in Hydrologocal and  Oceanic Sciences
department.ch: 水文與海洋科學研究所碩士班

goal.en: “1. understand the fundamental features of the ocean 2.understand the basic process of physical oceanography, chemical oceanography, marine biology and marine geology and geophysics 3.understand the importance of ocean in the earth system 4.understand the holstic relationship of the marine environment“
goal.ch: “1. 了解海洋之基本結構及特性 2. 了解海洋之物理、化學、地質及生物過程 3. 明瞭海洋在地球系統中之重要性 4. 了解整體海洋環境的相關性“

content.en:
“1. Ocean Basins
2. Ocean ＆ Atmospheric Circulation
4. The Chemical Equilibrium of Ocean
5. Life in the Ocean
6. Marine Environment
7. Ocean and Climate
8. Rotating Coordinate frames : Coriolis force and Rossby number
9. Density stratification and the Ekman Layer
9. Vorticity and Kelvin Theorem
10. Waves and Tides
11. Ocean circulation
12. Surface and Internal Waves“
content.ch:
“1. 海盆之地質構造
2. 海洋及大氣環流
3. 海水化學特性
4. 海洋生態
5. 海洋環境問題
6. 海洋與氣候
7. 介紹地球旋轉座標上的運動 : 科氏力與Rossby number
8. 密度分層與艾克曼效應
9. 漩度與 Kelvin Theorem
10. 潮汐
11. 大洋環流
12. 表面波與內波“

textbook.en: “1. Tom Garrison, Essentials of Oceanography, 7th ed. Thomson Learning Inc., Pacific Grove 2. Supplementary readings“
textbook.ch: “1. Tom Garrison, Essentials of Oceanography, 7th ed. Thomson Learning Inc., Pacific Grove 2. Supplementary readings“

grading.en: “Homework and quizes (20％), mid-term and final exams (80％)“
grading.ch: 作業及平時考20％、期中及期末考80％

domain.en: 水文循環 、 水文環境
domain.ch: 水文循環 、 水文環境
